sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>gold</radical> radical and the <kanji>gold</kanji> kanji are the same!
meaningInfo: Just know your radicals and you'll be golden, so to speak.
readingMnemonic: The most <kanji>gold</kanji> in the land belongs to the <reading>Kin</reading>g (<ja>きん</ja>) of England. In fact, you've never actually met someone with gold, it all goes straight to the King whenever someone finds some. You just have a few pennies to work with.
readingInfo: Picture the King on a huge pile of gold. Gold coins, gold candelabras, gold ponies. He's laughing and pointing at all of it while making very strong eye contact with you.
